programme.title: Queen Elizabeth and Pope John Paul II
programme.short_synopsis: Queen Elizbeth's trip to California and the Pope's visit to Central America.
programme.medium_synopsis: Press coverage of Queen Elizabeth's sightseeing tour of California is dwarfed by that of Pope John Paul II's visit to Guatemala, El Salvador and Nicaragua.
